definitions.definition: A Gram-negative bacterium , of the genus Yersinia , that is an etiological agent of several diseases in animals and humans, notably Yersinia pestis , which causes bubonic plague .

main_definition: A Gram-negative bacterium , of the genus Yersinia , that is an etiological agent of several diseases in animals and humans, notably Yersinia pestis , which causes bubonic plague .
